description: Take a tour around Bromley Archives. The archive store itself is normally closed to the public and visitors will be allowed access within this space and a look at some of the items that we have in our collection.

factsheet.heading: Treasures of the Archives
paragraphs: Learn about Bromley Historic Collections Archive Service and see the Archive for yourself. Our items range from the 17th century to the current day and showcase the history of what is now the London Borough of Bromley. We will be conducting tours of the normally locked archive store and showing a few choice items from the collections.

images.title: The Archives at Bromley Historic Collections

location.address: Bromley Historic Collections, Bromley Central Library, High Street

name: Bromley Archives- Bromley Central Library
